instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' for icons and 'framer-motion' for animations.
2. CLEANUP: Remove all default CRA styles in App.css and index.css. Apply the dark theme variables in index.css.
3. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts link to the <head> of public/index.html immediately.
4. IMAGES: Use the provided 'William' image for the Hero background. Ensure text contrast is high using overlays.
5. WHATSAPP: The 'Aula Gratuita' and 'Agendar' buttons must link to 'https://wa.me/553199490457'.
6. MOBILE: Ensure the Hero text is readable on mobile (stack elements). The Navbar should have a mobile menu or simple layout.
7. TESTIDS: Add data-testid to all buttons and inputs.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very subtle shine.
Use 2x more padding than you think is necessary.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the dark background.
